entry.title: U.S. Spy Chief Sees Putin Preparing for Long Fight in Ukraine
entry.content: The U.S. spy chief said the Russian president still seeks to control swaths of Ukraine beyond the eastern region, after local authorities said Russian missiles struck the port city of Odessa overnight, killing one person and wounding others.

entry.title: Shanghai's Lockdown Leaves Thousands Sleeping in Its Streets
entry.content: Many of the cityâ€™s newly homeless are food-delivery workers facing a difficult choice: locked in without income or locked out with a job.

entry.title: Nearly Encircled, Ukraine's Last Stronghold in Luhansk Resists Russian Onslaught
entry.content: With no power, water, cellphone coverage or access to news, remaining residents in a Donbas regional city shelter in basements, hoping to survive.
